name: vulnerability information obtained via Trivy DB

tables.name: vulnerabilities
tables.def:
CREATE TABLE vulnerabilities (
        id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
        vulnerability_id TEXT NOT NULL,
        value TEXT NOT NULL,
        created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
    )

tables.name: vulnerability_advisories

indexes.name: va_source_package_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX va_source_package_idx ON vulnerability_advisories(platform, segment, package)

indexes.name: va_source_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX va_source_idx ON vulnerability_advisories(platform, segment)

indexes.name: va_vulnerability_advisories_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX va_vulnerability_advisories_idx ON vulnerability_advisories(vulnerability_id, platform, segment, package)

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE vulnerability_advisories (
        id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
        vulnerability_id TEXT NOT NULL,
        platform TEXT NOT NULL,
        segment TEXT NOT NULL,
        package TEXT NOT NULL,
        value TEXT NOT NULL,
        created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
    )
